      • read

        public double read()
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Reads the voltage that is currently applied to the pin.
        Returns:
        A value ranging from 0.0 to 1.0. This is the percentage of the voltage reference value that is currently applied on this pin.

      • sample

        public double[] sample(int amountSamples)
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Grabs a number of readings from the analog input in short succession.
        Parameters:
        amountSamples - the amount samples to be taken
        Returns:
        an array of values ranging between 0.0 and 1.0. These represent the percentage of the voltage reference that were supplied to the pin when the measurement was taken.

      • sample

        public double[] sample(int amountSamples,
              float frequency)
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Grabs a number of readings from the analog input, sampled with the specified frequency.
        Parameters:
        amountSamples - the amount samples to be taken
        frequency - the frequency that should be used for sampling
        Returns:
        an array of values ranging between 0.0 and 1.0. These represent the percentage of the voltage reference that were supplied to the pin when the measurement was taken.

      • sampleAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<double[]> sampleAsync(int amountSamples)
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Grabs a number of readings asynchronously from the analog input in short succession. The program will continue execution while the samples are being taken.
        Parameters:
        amountSamples - the amount samples to be taken
        Returns:
        A future containing an array of the sampled values. These values range between 0.0 and 1.0, which represents the percentage of the reference voltage that has been measured.

      • sampleAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<double[]> sampleAsync(int amountSamples,
                                                float frequency)
        Description copied from interface: AnalogInput
        Grabs a number of readings asynchronously from the analog input, sampled with the specified frequency. The program will continue execution while the samples are being taken.
        Parameters:
        amountSamples - the amount samples to be taken
        frequency - the frequency that should be used for sampling
        Returns:
        A future containing an array of the sampled values. These values range between 0.0 and 1.0, which represents the percentage of the reference voltage that has been measured.
